director.name: 艾琳·李·卡尔 Erin Lee Carr

this_title: Perfect Wife: The Mysterious Disappearance of Sherri Papini
trans_title: 完美妻子：雪莉·帕皮尼的神秘失踪事件
introduction: Keith and Sherri Papini's seemingly idyllic life is shattered when Sherri vanishes from their rural California neighborhood, triggering a frenzied search that becomes news around the world. But once Sherri is found, a new nightmare begins.
chinese_title: 完美妻子：雪莉·帕皮尼的神秘失踪事件
foreign_title: Perfect Wife: The Mysterious Disappearance of Sherri Papini
